content: this is part 1 of the arcanoweave doily there are 8 rounds and measures about 4 in diameter here are links for the next 4 sections- part 2 incanter s insight- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/incanters-insight part 3 evocation- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/evocation part 4 innervision- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/innervision part 5 terrace of the magi- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/terrace-of-the-magi **materials needed** size 10 crochet thread- 20-25 yards 1 75 mm hook yarn needle scissors **gauge** rounds 1-4 measure about 1 1/2
